item.title: Compile Fix Updated!
item.dc:creator: @Finnagon Finnagon
item.description:
@Finnagon wrote:

Although i said that

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe” server

runs the server, it’s also a messy job using the java executable to launch a class file…

so the “best” command for running your client / server is using this.

java -Xmx500m Server (or client)

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Fix Updated!
item.dc:creator: @Finnagon Finnagon
item.description:
@Finnagon wrote:

Thats a Compile & Run code actually…

This line is for compiling .java into .class
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java

this line is for running your server, obviously
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe” server

I save them as seperate Batch files so you don’t have to wait for it to compile every time you want to start the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Fix Updated!
item.dc:creator: @RsPwNeR RsPwNeR
item.description:
@RsPwNeR wrote:

OK GUYS… heres some help for the freakin compile…

@echo off
COLOR 08
title X-Scap3 server
“C:\Programmer\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Programmer\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe” server
pause

thats what i use now look here:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title X-Scap3 server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe” server
pause

Second One Look now:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title X-Scap3 server
“C:\Programs\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Programs\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe” server
pause

try some of them ! c yas

oh and by the way i need some damn work if anyone needs a coder contact me: Mikkelvesterdahl@hotmail.com
